response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence and quality. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value lies well beyond $1,200,000. However, considering your potential needs and the opportunity to bring such a remarkable item into your possession, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this masterpiece for a special consideration of $1,500,000. This generous offer is valid for a limited time, providing you with an opportunity to secure this extraordinary piece at an advantageous price. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how this product could enhance your life or business. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1500000}
